unnormalised: Hey film buffs! The festival season is upon us, and get ready to overdose on cinema! From Cannes to the Kerala International Film Festival, the world is your silver screen.
normalised: Hey film buffs! The festival season is upon us, and get ready to overdose on cinema! From Cannes to the Kerala International Film Festival, the world is your silver screen. This year, buzz is building around several indie darlings making their rounds, hoping to snag a coveted award. Speaking of Kerala, Kiff is known for showcasing films that push boundaries and spark conversation - not to mention, it's perfectly timed for enjoying some delicious Onam Sadhya! Early whispers suggest that director Anurag Kashyap might be premiering a new project soon, possibly at Venice, which has everyone on tenterhooks. And closer to home, keep an eye out for announcements regarding the Kolkata International Film Festival in November, it's always a riot of colour and cinematic magic. So, grab your popcorn, settle in, and prepare for a cinematic journey across cultures. Don't forget to check out the schedule for your local film festivals; you might just discover your new favourite filmmaker! Plus, imagine all the biryani you can eat during a movie marathon!
